body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Richardson Auto Sales. My name is Ralph Richardson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Laura. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling nervous about the inventory availability. Can you check if the Dodge Charger is in stock?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Laura. To assist you further, may I have your phone number and email address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is four five six seven eight nine zero one two three and my email is laura.kelly@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Laura. I will check on the Dodge Charger inventory and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Laura. Thank you for reaching out to us. We'll be in touch soon. Have a great day!
